scripts.build: cleancss css/*.css -o styles.min.css && terser js/*.js -o script.min.js -c -m && javascript-obfuscator script.min.js --output script.min.js --compact true --control-flow-flattening true --self-defending true --disable-console-output true
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run unit:test && npm run e2e:test
